###################
velocity_modifiers
###################

**Module:** oceantracker.velocity_modifiers


.. toctree::
	:maxdepth: 1

	TerminalVelocity.rst
	VelocityModiferBase.rst

**Role:** These classes add additional particle velocities to water velocity, eg terminal velocity, by updating  particle property "velocity_modifier" once per time step, which is added to water velocity every RK substep
